bibl.title: Chairemon: Alexandrian Citizen, Royal Scribe, Gymnasiarch, Landholder at Bacchias, and Loving Father. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: A new interpretation of B.G.U. III, 981, and the combination of this text with other documents yield a view on the business affairs and private life of a basilikos grammateus in Roman Egypt.
